entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [CollectionView] Review Strategies to reduce Child Measure Propagation #25391
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • DataTrigger doesn't change Rectangle background color on iOS #25385
  • Garbage Collection causes a freeze with Shell. #25382
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • .NET MAUI Windows app can't start #25372
  • OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25371
  • Collection View Scrolling Not Smooth on iOS 18 (Version 8.0.92), While Versions 8.0.40 and iOS 17 Perform Smoothly #25369
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Android RefreshView in a grid can break the grid layout #25368
    Backlog
  • Android Grid.WidthRequest/Grid.HeightRequest mismatches Grid.Measure results #25365

Closed

  • ImageButton with Style set crashes Android app #25388
  • [net9-rc2] Trim analysis warning IL2026 using XamlTypeResolver with Compiled Bindings #25199
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Mac Catalyst MAUI build Application Name appearing as Assembly Name - Causing Apple Rejection #25364
  • .NET9 GA Backport Tracking #25327
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Images, loaded from stream, are not displayed in Release mode on Android using .NET 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.12 version #25283
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Hyper v activation #25354

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Titlebar name API and add templates #25390
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [gh actions] introduce "inclusive heat sensor" #25389
  • Set title on maui-blazor template window #25387
    area-templates
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #2 #25378
    area-testing
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes error *.png is being used by another process #25374
  • [iOS] Transparent button border color when border color is not set #25373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Fix for Single item alignment issue in CollectionView HorizontalGrid Layout #25370
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Fixed CollectionView MeasureFirstItem Rendering issue #25367
    community ✨
  • Moving last Xamarin.UITests to Appium #25366
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Android] Create `DatePickerDialog` on demand #25363
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update .NET MAUI template with .NET 9 hovercraft bot 🤖 #25383
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Report XC0025 as an error only in strict compilation mode #25298
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Fix passing message arguments to BuildException when logging warning as error #25326
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [nuget-msi-convert] Do not use new VS component IDs #25355
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Add services.AddHybridWebViewDeveloperTools() extension to enable browser dev tools #25330
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [main] Make main net9 #25351
  • Fix Test Screenshots with new clipping code #25381
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [net9.0] Run device tests arm #25375
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Fix support for x:TypeArguments on root node #25287
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [X] inherit DataType based on attribute #25296
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] disable AOT warning on InitComp #25297
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [UITest] Remove the bottom section of iOS UITest (#24586) #25353
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [net9.0] Fix CV2 handler and uitests fixes #25361

Updated

  • [net9.0][Enhancement][Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [net9.0][Enhancement][iOS] Add a done button to entry #24645
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Merge sr9 into net9 ga #25265
  • HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
  • Measure invalidation performance and fixes (batching version) #24823
    community ✨
  • Improve performance of rendering `DatePicker` #24948
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • Propagate any Page.Title to the window, not just for Shell #25338
    area-templates, area-controls-window
  • [ios,tests] Fix iOS Header with Group #25157
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview
  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #1 #25178
    area-testing
  • Improve TextToSpeech function by adding a speech rate parameter #24798
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #25180
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-gestures
  • Entry Height gets updated when loaded inside the RoundRectangle Shape #25166
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] compile StaticResource w/ generics #25352
    area-xaml
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Propagate x:DataType from parent scope to "standalone bindings" #25295
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for TextDecorations not updating after modifying Label text #25339
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Android] Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Run device tests arm #25331
    do-not-merge
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • Fix for picker on hidden page opens after back navigation in Android #25319
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix for Frame PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #25239
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures
  • Fixed [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #25311
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-gestures
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨
  • [XC] Add file info to exception reports #25359
    area-xaml
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu
  • [Android] Reset ListView ScrolledEventArgs.ScrollY when ItemsSource changes #25362
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-listview
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Re-enable tests #25268
    .NET 9.0 GA
